2 from base.callback import Callback
3 from languages.asp.answer_sets import AnswerSets

6 class MyCallback(Callback):
7 
8  def __init__(self, count=1):
9  self.count = count
10  self.lock = threading.Condition()
11  self.ans = None
12 
13  def __count_down(self):
14  self.lock.acquire()
15  self.count -= 1
16  if self.count <= 0:
17  self.lock.notifyAll()
18  self.lock.release()
19 
20  def await(self):
21  self.lock.acquire()
22  while self.count > 0:
23  self.lock.wait()
24  self.lock.release()
25 
26  def callback(self, o):
27  if (not isinstance(o, AnswerSets)):
28  return
29  self.ans = o
30  self.__count_down()
31 
32  def get_output(self):
33  return self.ans
